subject: Re: GPLv2-only users of Samba library code?
body:
Andrew,

 > Just to clarify, libsmbclient (currently GPLv2 or later) would move with
 > the rest of the code to GPLv3 or later?  (not move to LGPL of any
 > version).

you're right, thank you.

We'd still like to hear from GPLv2-only users of libsmbclient though. 

Cheers, Tridge
